text: Akihabara Station(秋葉原駅,あきはばらえき) is a railway station of JR East, Tokyo Metro, and Metropolitan Intercity Railway Company in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. ==Neighbor== ;JR East :Keihin-Tōhoku Line : Rapid ::Tokyo - Akihabara - Ueno : Local ::Kanda - Akihabara - Okachimachi :Yamanote Line ::Kanda - Akihabara - Okachimachi :Chūō-Sōbu Line ::Asakusabashi - Akihabara - Ochanomizu ;Tokyo Metro :Hibiya Line ::Kodenmachō (H-14) - Akihabara (H-15) - Naka-Okachimachi (H-16) ;Metropolitan Intercity Railway Company :Tsukuba Express :Rapid, Semi Rapid, Local ::Akihabara (01) - Shin-Okachimachi (02) ==Related pages== Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Akihabara Station
